headline: Developer’s Plan for a Wall Crumbles Under Criticism
abstract: The developer of Hudson Yards has backed off a plan that would have put a giant wall next to the High Line.
lead_paragraph: It was supposed to be a giant concrete supporting wall that sliced through part of Manhattan’s West Side. On one side would be the High Line, a popular park. On the other would be a public portion of Hudson Yards, the largest mixed-use private real estate venture in American history.
